There are at least 8 popular Li battery chemistries today and not all of them are so dangerous.  For example, the Lithium Iron Phosphate (#LiFePO4 or “LFP”) type, largely used in solar panel and in back up energy systems, is among the safest batteries to date!

The @FAANews has officially approved the use of drones to restore cell service in Puerto Rico, following the devastation brought about there by Hurricane Maria.

Watch here to learn more about how drones are helping restore connectivity in Puerto Rico: https://t.co/LmNn5lbIni

@sfchas @FAANews @FAASafetyBrief Oh please drop in on DC we r never away for long and would love to see you. (Back now for example tho heading out to SoCal in 2 weeks.) What's going on in Berlin? Should we switch to text?

Seriously how r u? Still at ucsf? Miss you!

There seems to be no end of the line for @Boeing as issues keep stacking up for the aerospace giant.
According to @FAANews, some undelivered 787s are afflicted with new manufacturing quality issues.
Click on the link in the main tweet to know more.
@hanahelena @FAANews @FAASafetyBrief Too low for minimum altitude FARs. High enough to ensure a safe landing in unpopulated areas otherwise at least 500'.

@FAANews it’s disturbing that flight crews not only have to deal with COVID and the safety of passengers. But also “Unruly Aggressive Passengers”. I applaud the penalties. But I feel just like all preflight safety talks. Crews should add, if you act up, these are the penalties.
